Privacy Policy

Effective Date: October 10, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how Xpert Forex Trade ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you visit and use xpertforextrade.com ("the Site").

Information We Collect

  • Personal Information: We may collect your name, email address, and other contact details when you sign up, subscribe, or contact us.
  • Usage Data: We collect non-personal information such as browser type, IP address, pages visited, and access times for analytics.
  • Cookies: The Site uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience and analyze usage.

How We Use Your Information

  • To provide, operate, and maintain our website
  • To improve, personalize, and expand our website
  • To communicate with you, including sending updates and responding to inquiries
  • For analytics and advertising, including Google AdSense (see below)
  • To comply with legal obligations

Google AdSense & Third-Party Services

We use Google AdSense and other third-party tools to display advertisements and analyze website traffic. These parties may use cookies and collect usage data according to their own privacy policies.

You can review Google's policies here.

Your Rights & Choices

  • You may opt out of cookies via your browser settings.
  • You can contact us to update, correct, or delete your personal information.

Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, but no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.
